detail.title: B.Sc. Computer Science & Engineering
achievements: In FBK I worked as a Software and Data Engineer, with particular focus on Data Visualization.

detail.title: Software & Data Engineer
achievements: Worked in an interdisciplinary team and actively participated to various research projects that resulted in scientific papers
Designed and developed scalable processing pipelines to analyze, integrate and efficiently store data coming from multiple sources and in different formats
Deeply dived into data visualization techniques specific formation courses
Designed and developed a full-stack application to process, store and dynamically visualize NLP analyzed text data with dynamic and interactive charts and maps
Designed and deployed the cloud infrastructure to host different interconnected Linux based VMs for high computing tasks

detail.title: Technical Analyst
detail.content:
I work as a Technical Analyst in the Geocall Product Development Group

In particular:

  • I perform in-depth technical analysis of data, business logic and view layers of the existing software solution
  • I work closely with business analysts to define the requirements of new software functionalities to be integrated in the Product
  • I collaborate with the development teams to design the data and object models, process flows, user experience, page layouts and system integration structures based on SOAP and REST
  • I define and distribute development tasks among the developers and I carry on code reviews on their outputs
  • I test and improve technical documents and conduct practical sessions with international partners to technically introduce them to the Product
